p.s: ImI'm 41 years old and I immigrated to New York from Iraq in 2005.
I immigrated because in Iraq there is an awful situation and iI can't secure that everyone in my family is safe.
I also want that my two sons can get some education.
I want them to feel savesafe when they grow up.
They can't looselose the most beautiful years of their lives.
They need to find friends and be happy not scared.
I also want my wife to be safe aswell.
That's why I went first in 2005 to see if the way to the US is even safe for my wife and my two sons.
2 years later my wife followed with our kids.
I was scared that something would happen to them in these 2 years.
But when they arrived I felt relieved because we all together accomplished our dream.
We could finally live in peace.
A few weeks after we arrived I found a job and my kids went to school.
Almost everything in the US was way easier than in Iraq.
In the future I hope that many other people from critical countries can make their way to the US and live in peace.
